description:
Centrally located at Armor Alley Walkway/Pocket Park and East Lancaster Ave at 147 E Lancaster (Bus Rt 30)."
"East Branch Brewery" and "Estrella" are located across Lancaster Ave in the "Old Alert Fire House" building adjacent to the huge Municipal parking lot. "Georgio's Deli and Restaurant' are next door and then "McDonalds".
Entry to the apartment is ground floor doorway off of Armor Alley Walkway that leads from East Lancaster Ave to Mill Road and on to the Milltown Market Complex with Planet Fitness, Kimberton Whole Foods, Green Street Grill and more..   Kerr Park and the Streuble Trail are a nearby walk or jog.
Rent includes heat, hot/cold water, gas for stove, sewer and trash removal at dumpster.  One window air conditioner unit is provided. Electric and Cable are paid by tenant.  Comcast ready.

Application with personal and credit references required. Make contact for a walk-thru appointment.
Available for immediate occupancy.  Mature professional occupied building managed personally by life-time owner.

Rent is due in full on the morning of the first day of each month deposited on the premises.
Photo is the decorated apartment of a prior tenant.  The walls are currently antique white. The apartment is clean and  comfortable.  If you are local, go look.  Apt 1 at rear of apartment building.

title: This One Is Just a Special Complete Renovation!!
description:
This one is just special. Complete renovation that transformed a cool loft into a modern masterpiece. This expansive space features two bedrooms (both fully-enclosed), two baths and more than 1300 square feet with views of the city skyline. The kitchen was reconfigured and upgraded with stainless steel KitchenAid appliances, custom charred oak upper shelving and a custom high top island. Custom woodwork (throughout unit) created by local, modern design firm, Studio Cidra. A glass partition was installed between the kitchen and the master bedroom for privacy and full enclosure. Custom sill for the window ledge and charred oak cabinets along the living room wall frame the stunning fireplace accent wall. This wall was treated with dark Venetian plaster to give the space warmth and dimensionality. Both bathrooms were fully renovated with luxury finishes. Master, en-suite bath features a new custom vanity and a walk-in shower with custom shower glass. Second bathroom offers a shower/bathtub and provides access to utility closet with stacked, front load washer and dryer. Refinished hardwood floors throughout bring additional warmth to the space, as well as, rustic charm. Custom closets installed in the bedrooms and hallway offer extensive storage. What more could this stunner offer? Oh, a covered parking spot in the secure, attached garage. If you’re seeking a luxury space that is not cookie-cutter, this is for you. 2200 Arch Street Condominiums is a full-service, New York-style loft building that offers amazing amenities and has one of the best locations in Center City. Just a short walk from Rittenhouse Square, 30th St Station, Aramark, Morgan Lewis, Comcast the Schuylkill River Trail and the Parkway, everything you need for is within a few blocks. Adding to the convenience are Trader Joe’s and the new Giant Riverwalk, which are directly across the street. This home is within the Greenfield Catchment and includes one (1) covered parking spot.

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a Part of History
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.ÃƒÂ‚Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. title: Welcome Home to 1712 Green Street, Located on a Quiet 3-Lined Street!!
description:
Great unit located on a quiet tree-lined street in the highly desired Fairmount - Art Museum Area. This two-bedroom bi-level residence offers stunning high ceilings with distinctive art deco details. Large windows provide an abundance of natural light. The space is enhanced by the hardwood flooring and recessed lighting. Enter into the large living room perfect for entertaining and flow right into the kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. The spacious master suite with two closets and full bath are located on this level. Out the back of the home is a stunning outdoor space dedicated to this unit only. A private fenced in back yard awaits for all your outdoor entertaining needs. Moving to the lower level of the unit is a large bedroom with ample closet space, a laundry room, full bath and extra living space for gym, office or media room. Additional storage unit is included in the basement. This home is located just steps to the Art Museum, Schuylkill River Trail, Boathouse Row, and Center City. One block away from the new Green Street Dog Park, the Spring Gardens community gardens, and the premier Roberto Clemente Park & Playground. Enjoy numerous nearby cafes and restaurants. Easy access to the brand new Whole Foods, Target, FedEx Office, and the Retro Fitness gym. Transportation is easy - considered a Walker's Paradise (Walk Score 92), a Biker's Paradise (Bike Score 95), and excellent access to bus routes and the Broad Street Subway Line.This is a definite must-see!
1712 Green St #1

title: 4552 Baker Street
description:
The house is in a nice prime location and walking distance to iconic Manayunk bridge/station, main street, and river view for bikers, runners and walkers. It is a corner townhouse, spacious 3 bedroom, close to Main Street's attractions, Tow Path and SEPTA's train and bus stations. Exposed hardwood floors throughout, living and dining room, over-sized eat-in kitchen: refrigerator, range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave and quaint little fenced in rear yard for your four legged friends. 1.5 baths, plenty of closet space, washer/dryer IN UNIT. Easy access to I-76, City Avenue, Kelly Drive, college universities and hospitals. Short commute/train ride into Center City or suburbs.
Pet deposit will be required. Call or text for tour of the property.

title: Bright, Cozy, and Very Private 2 Bedroom Apartment in Northern Liberti
description:
Bright, cozy, and very private 2 bedroom apartment in Northern Liberties. This renovated bi-level owner's unit on the quaint N Lawrence Street takes up two floors of a three-story brick end-of-row home. Enter through your own private entrance and immediately ascend up the steps onto the 2nd floor. The Main Level consists of the Living Room with a fireplace, the Kitchen, and the bright Dining Room with five windows. A totally renovated Kitchen features all new cabinets, quartz countertops and new stainless steel appliances, including a 6-burner range , a dishwasher, and a French-door bottom-freezer refrigerator. Also on the second floor is the utility room with new washer and dryer. The 3rd floor is reached via a spiral stair and features two generous bedrooms - one with cathedral ceilings - and a fully renovated full bath. A/C, Nest thermostat, Ring security system. Located on a quiet street, this rental is within walking distance to all Northern Liberties has to offer. Tenant responsible for all utilities. First, last month rent, and SD required. No smoking, no pets please. 12 months lease only, no exceptions. Available 2/1/2023.
865 N Lawrence St #UPPER UNIT

title: Lofts 640 offers you the "most bang for your buck" in Philadelphia!

Included with your monthly rental price is extended cable TV service, fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant, and more!! Walk off the busy street into 640 North Broad and enter an urban space that combines the old with the new. Feel the past mix with a refreshing dose of hip, understated sophistication. The original character of the building is not lost but enhanced by modern accents and furnishings. A thriving community dwells within our walls -- a state-of-the-art fitness center, cyber cafe, and yoga studio serve to nurture body, mind, and spirit. Setting the night sky aglow, our glass-domed pool house is the perfect place to unwind. Go for a swim in the warm salt water, relax your muscles in the Jacuzzi, or meet and socialize on the roof deck lounge. Enter the lobby, your public space. Experience orange as it bursts in the artwork and pours from geometric ceiling lights that warm the mocha-colored floors. Accented with a healthy dose of pure white and stainless steel, contrast brings together the energizing elements of your entrance. A thriving community dwells within our walls -- a state-of-the-art fitness center, cyber cafe, and yoga studio serve to nurture body, mind, and spirit. Lofts 640 is centrally located to Philadelphia shoppes, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Minutes from Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center, Lofts 640 combines commuter convenience of center city living with spectacular urban spaciousness of true loft living.*Property amenities-Cable included in rent Reconnect at the Cyber Lounge. title: Beautiful Apt in One of the City's Most Desirable Neighborhoods!
description:
A beautiful apartment in one of the city's most desirable neighborhoods! Enter this bi-level unit and discover the hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, high ceilings with installed speakers, and large energy efficient windows which provide ample natural light. The spacious, open living and dining space offers plenty of room for entertaining friends and family, and showcases the gorgeous kitchen, which includes granite counters and large island, stainless steel appliances, and a beautifully tiled backsplash. Continue past the kitchen to find the beautifully tiled bathroom with tub and shower combo, and separate stall shower with frameless glass enclosure, both with dual showerheads. The floor also includes a sun drenched bedroom with a walk in closet and access to a patio- just the spot for lounging on those sunny days! Downstairs features two lovely ensuite bedrooms with custom tiled bathrooms and stall showers with frameless glass enclosures. Washer and dryer are included in the unit, as well as an installed security system, and the location can't be beat- close to shops, restaurants, not to mention just minutes away from Center City. Don't wait, see this unit today!
1519 Bainbridge St #A

title: Check Out Why The Hills Are Alive With The Sound Of Music
description:
Welcome to 1110 Burmont Rd. in the popular Drexel Manor Aronimink neighborhood in Drexel Hill. This spacious 4-bedroom 2 bath single family brick Cape Code offers beautiful modern updates including freshly painted neutral wall colors, wood trim and wainscoting, luxury vinyl plank on the first level, real hardwood flooring on the second level, recessed lighting and ceiling fans throughout and newer thermal windows. The charming closed and secure front porch welcomes you into a large light-filled formal living room and formal dining room, both with larger picture windows to bring the exterior beauty inside. The newly updated kitchen offers plenty of new bright white wood cabinetry, granite countertops, custom tile backsplash, new stainless steel kitchen appliances, more recessed lighting along with a small eat in area. Step out the rear kitchen door and into a sunroom with plenty of windows overlooking the patio and private rear yard. A 2-car detached garage is just steps away and at the back of a long driveway. The first level also features a primary bedroom with a completely updated full bath with a subway tiled shower, new vanity, lighting and tile floor. Two additional bedrooms on the first level share a full hall bath with a tiled tub and shower, new vanity, lighting and tile floor. The second level offers two additional nicely sized bedrooms, ample closet space, and an updated half bath. The finished lower level provides extra space for entertainment, a playroom, or home office. The laundry room is located in the basement and the washer and dryer included. Almost 2,000 above grade square feet of finished living space on a level lot with a great set back in a walkable neighborhood. Convenient location to great shopping, restaurants, Public Transportation including 7 minutes from Drexel Hill Station, Septa rail and lots of outdoor activities with Indian Rock Park, golf clubs and Upper Darby high school just a few blocks away. A short drive to Center City, The Main Line and Philadelphia Airport.

title: Smoke-free apartments available, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: This is a cat friendly community, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
1144 FRANKFORD AVENUE, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19125
Welcome to the Frankford Collective! Unit #202 is a 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom 2nd Floor apartment offering an open floor plan for a spacious and lavish atmosphere. This is a gorgeous, newly constructed building apartments . Nestled in the heart of Fishtown, you'll be surrounded by some of the city's best nightlife and entertainment options. This fantastic new building features an elevator, shared roof deck, and modern, luxurious finishes with in-unit laundry conveniently located in each unit. The stunning kitchens boast white shaker cabinets, lovely blue tile backsplash, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including an electric range, dishwasher, microwave, and French door refrigerator. The bedrooms are bright and spacious with good closet space. Head into the beautiful bathrooms to view lighted modern vanities with circular mirrors, detailed tile flooring, and tiled bathtub / shower combos. About The Neighborhood: Located in Fishtown, directly on Frankford Avenue offering nonstop restaurants, cafes, and bars. You'll be just steps from the Girard Avenue Trolley Line, the Market Frankford Subway Line into Center City, and public transportation bus routes. Walkable to Penn Treaty Park, The Fillmore, Hetzell Playground, Brooklyn Bowl, & Rivers Casino. Neighborhood hotspots include Barcade, Johnny Brenda's, Front Street Cafe, Frankford Hall, Murph's, Weckerly's Ice Cream, and countless more.
